5. **Record Verification**: The claim states that their record improves to "11 win, 5 loss". From Row 16, we see the record is listed as "11 - 5" after this game, which confirms an improvement from a previous record of "10 - 5".

Since all conditions in the claim are satisfied by the data in Row 16, the claim is TRUE.
